response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to ensuring that such a valuable asset becomes accessible to those who truly appreciate its worth. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
